about_the_game:
Is home design software too professional? Is it too difficult to get started?
Try"CozySpace"!
Here, there is a vast model library that not only allows you to create spaces in various styles but also offers specially designed accessories for gamers, such as large desktops, gaming consoles, ambient lights, and more. Unleash your creativity to build your dream esports room.



It's like a free blueprint for a real room!
New features include irregular blueprints and the ability to create multiple rooms, increasing the fidelity of your room replication!



Adjust models freely, even turning off collision mode! In the game, you can adjust the size and color of models, and even turn off collision detection, freeing up the Y-axis for a more flexible design!




Use deformable cubes to achieve various layouts!




Like listening to music to relax?
here in Cozyspace, there's an integrated multi-track audio source. Each track can be adjusted individually, allowing you to configure the most suitable music according to your mood!



Don't want to do anything? Just want to chill?
Cozyspace is the best choice! Build your cozy mini home and enjoy the cyber sunrise and moonset with your little cat or dog.



Currently we are in the Early Access stage, and there will be more features coming in the future, waiting to meet players!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "Cozy Space" is a relaxing home decoration game with true-to-life models and rooms. Enjoy a leisurely gaming experience and easily create cozy spaces. It cleverly blends music elements, allowing you to be a composer, interior designer, or simply relax without specific tasks!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
